allow_caching.description: Allow RBClient to do caching of the requests (Default: True).

api_token.description: API token if using the token auth_method

auth_method.description: Authentication method to use - token or basic

in_memory_cache.description: Allow the cache to be maintained in memory (Default: False).

password.description: Password if using the basic auth_method

save_cookies.description: Save Cookies generated using password and username in a file (Default: True).

username.description: Username if using the basic auth_method

verify.description: Verify SSL certificate. Set to False to disable verification (Default: True).
